meanings.sent1: She wore sunglasses because her eyes were photosensitive.
meanings.sent2: The photosensitive film reacted quickly to the sunlight.
meanings.sent3: The photosensitive cat always squinted in the bright sun.
meanings.sent4: His photosensitive skin turned red like a ripe tomato under the sun.
meanings.sent5: The photosensitive plant closed its leaves as soon as the light touched it.

meanings.definition: A material that reacts to light.
meanings.sent1: The photosensitive paper changed color when exposed to sunlight.
meanings.sent2: The photosensitive emulsion on the film captured the image perfectly.
meanings.sent3: The photosensitive fabric glowed under the UV light at the party.
meanings.sent4: The photosensitive plate etched a beautiful design when exposed to light.
meanings.sent5: The photosensitive sensor detected even the faintest light in the room.
